alert.note: Alert for Outagamie; Shawano; Waupaca (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 12 at 8:57PM CDT until May 13 at 4:25PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Wolf River near Shiocton affecting Waupaca, Shawano and Outagamie Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Wolf River near Shiocton. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, There is minor flooding in the Shiocton area including the city park and boat landing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CDT Friday the stage was 11.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 AM CDT Friday was 11.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Friday afternoon May 13th. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed Wolf River Shiocton 11.0 11.0 Fri 7 am 10.7 10.3 10.0 9.7 9.4 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning.
